content.text: The Aplocaph were a sentient species preoccupied with finding love. They treated exotic locations and leisure time as an opportunity to find someone special. For this reason, the Aplocaph Saduu Nagag took a cruise aboard the giant luxury liner Kuari Princess up the Relgim Run. Almost hourly, Nagag cleaned his skin until it gleamed to ensure he was well groomed should he find "that one" being. Nagag was present on the Princess when it was boarded by pirates within the Maelstrom nebula.

The Aplocaph were created by Ray Winninger for the roleplaying game adventure Riders of the Maelstrom, published by West End Games in 1989. They later received an entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, published in 2008.
